title: FS: 1898 Big Run tobacco w/Ewing and Cody N28 images
author: Exhibitman

posts.post_title: FS: 1898 Big Run tobacco w/Ewing and Cody N28 images
posts.post_content:
Here is a cigar box lid/label with N28 and N29 images of HOFer Wm. [Buck] Ewing, Bill Cody, L.E. Myers, James Albert, Percy Stone and J. Schaefer.  The back of the wooden lid has a June 13, 1898 tax stamp.  $200 postpaid.  Paypal OK; no discount for check/MO since I have to take them to the bank.  Any questions, please PM.  First one to say I'll take it wins it.  

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/exhibitman/interestingbaseballcards/huge/1898%20Big%20Run%20Tobacco.jpg[/IMG]
